bio: Erik Spiekermann is a German typographer, designer, and author who is known for his contributions to the fields of typography and design. He is the founder of several design agencies, including MetaDesign and FontShop, and has worked on a wide range of projects, including corporate identities, typeface designs, and print and digital publications. Spiekermann is also a respected author and speaker, and has written several books on typography and design, including "Stop Stealing Sheep & Find Out How Type Works" and "I DOT SO: The Periodic Table of Typefaces." He is widely regarded as one of the most influential figures in the world of typography and design, and his work has been recognized with numerous awards and accolades.
